short_summary: Dry-docking and ship repair services for the CCGS Des Groseilliers
description: Request for Proposal for the acquisition of ship repair work, including dry docking, on the CCGS Des Groseilliers in Saint John's, NL.
full_summary:
## F3065-221995 - CCGS Des Groseilliers, Dry Dock Repair, Spring 2023
### Invitation to Bid - Request for Proposal
#### Solicitation Reference
   * Solicitation Number: WS3847088348
   * Amendment Number: 5
   * Publication Date: March 6, 2023
   * Tender Closing Date: April 19, 2023, 2:00 P.M. EDT
   * Amendment Date: April 6, 2023

#### Subject and Scope
The Government of Canada, on behalf of the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) and the Canadian Coast Guard (CCG), is issuing this Request for Proposal (RFP) for the dry dock repair of the Canadian Coast Guard Ship (CCGS) Des Groseilliers. The subject CCGS is currently located in Saint John's, NL and the services required include dry docking and ship repair.

#### Bidding Requirements
Interested bidders are required to submit their proposal electronically through the Bid Solicitation Website by the tender closing date, April 19, 2023 at 2:00 P.M. EDT. All proposals submitted after this date and time will be declared non-responsive. The required bidding documents can be found on the website.

#### Trade Agreements
This bid is open to bids from all qualified suppliers and is covered under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

#### Contact Information
* Contact Name: Gabriel Piras
* Contact Email: gabriel.piras@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### Notice URL
* The detailed solicitation can be accessed at: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15588480?extsite=MTU1ODg0ODBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15588480?extsite=MTU1ODg0ODBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
